title: Freelance Engineer - Ryo
description: A freelance engineer based in Hokkaido, specializing in EC site development using Shopify and WordPress.

hero.title: RyoCode
hero.description: Specializing in development with Shopify and WordPress.

jobs_description.title: Freelance Engineer
jobs_description.description: Focusing on EC site development and customization using Shopify. Creating high-performance websites with attention to detail. Providing technical support for business growth through website renewals, SEO optimization, and speed optimization of existing sites.

jobs_description.title: Japan Ground Self-Defense Force
jobs_description.description: Served in the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force for 11 years. Developed teamwork, leadership, and crisis management skills through organizational missions. These experiences now contribute to project management and client communication.

projects.title: Polycarbonate Custom Order EC Site
projects.description: Developed an EC site for custom polycarbonate products using Shopify. Implemented a custom order system with calculation logic to enable users to easily purchase products according to their specifications.

projects.title: SNORE512
projects.description: Built an EC site for SNORE512, an apparel brand featuring French Bulldog Kotetsu. Implemented as a brand site offering apparel products and goods made with organic cotton. Integrated with Printful for inventory management and shipping.

projects.title: &Pilates WordPress Site
projects.description: Handled coding and partial design for &Pilates. Implemented coding from design comp and created custom WordPress theme. Used Sass and GSAP for coding, incorporating custom fields (ACF), custom posts, and MW WP Form.

contributions.title: Technical Content on X
contributions.description: Daily sharing of practical insights about Shopify and web development. Sharing valuable information about coding efficiency, freelance career strategies, and EC development know-how with over 1,100 followers.

contributions.title: Daily Trial Community
contributions.description: Active member of the Daily Trial community, sharing knowledge with other developers.

contributions.title: Technical Blog Writing
contributions.description: Running a technical blog focused on EC development and Shopify customization. Posts about practical development know-how and performance improvement case studies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Freelance Engineer
description: Started working as a freelance developer in 2022, primarily focusing on EC site development using Shopify and WordPress.
Have completed over 50 Shopify development and customization projects, handling various business models including subscription services, membership sites, and cross-border EC.
Currently also working as an instructor at Samurai Engineer, contributing to the development of next-generation engineers.

contact.title: Let's Discuss Your Project
contact.subtitle: From EC site development to website renovation, feel free to reach out
